question: The "Saaremaa Island" is located in which country?
explanation: Saaremaa Island is the largest island of Estonia, located in the Baltic Sea. Which forms part of the west Estonian Aego, along with Hiiumaa Island and Muhu Island. This Island forms the main barrier between the Gulf of Rega and the baltic Sea. This island was one of the major battle sites between Nazi Germany and the USSR during WW2.
